name: Conky GUI
tagline: Text editor for Conky configuration files.
body:
ConkyGUI
========

Conky GUI aims to quicken the customization of Conky files.

This is only a graphic user interface (GUI). If you don't have Conky yet, check the [Conky](http://conky.sourceforge.net/) website for the latest version.

Features:

 * syntax highlight
 * word completion
 * run conky from the gui
 * color pickers
 * easy access to configuration variables

#####Docs

 * [Build] (https://github.com/givanse/Conky-GUI/tree/master/docs/build.md) - Compile and build your own packages
 * [Contribute] (https://github.com/givanse/Conky-GUI/tree/master/docs/contribute.md) - Guide to contribute on the project
 * [Install] (https://github.com/givanse/Conky-GUI/tree/master/docs/install.md) -  Install or remove Conky GUI
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
